input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories don’t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Multicolor LED Faceted Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Frosted Swiss Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Clear LED Lights and Berries'
  - Name='Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Pure White LED Faceted Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Beacon Hill Cypress Garland'
  - Name='Red Sleigh Sequoia Fir Commercial Unlit Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Christmas Time 2 ft. Prelit Yardville Pine Artificial Christmas Porch Tree'
  - Name='FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Potted Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland'
  - Name='Christmas Time Yardville Pine 2-ft. Prelit Accent Tree'
  - Name='FRONTGate Gilded Elegance Outdoor Christmas Decorations Swag'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Glittery Pomegranate Pine Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Centerville Pine Christmas Tree with Lighting'
  - Name='Northlight 6'x8" Pre-Lit Decorated Burgundy and Gold Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7.5 ft. Norway Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Clear LED Lights Pine Cones & Berries'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Snow Mountain Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 6'x10" Pre-Lit Decorated Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit White Pine Christmas Garland with 50 Warm White LED Lights and Timer'
  - Name='Northlight 6' Leaves Berry and Pine Needle Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Shadow Woods Flocked Spruce 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Plug in'
  - Name='National Tree Company Alpine Collection Decorated Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Norfolk Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Winona Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Multicolor LED Faceted Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar pre-lit pine garland, with LED lights and intended for holiday decoration. Slight difference in light color (multicolor), but core functions and features match closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and core garland type, though no mention of lights; may be unlit, lowering relevancy compared to pre-lit reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Frosted Swiss Pine Artificial Garland with 50 Clear LED Lights and Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar as pre-lit pine garland with LED lights and additional decorative elements; half as many lights and 'frosted' look, but functionally close.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 18' Pre-Lit Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Pure White LED Faceted Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly similar: artificial pine garland, pre-lit with LED lights, nearly same purpose and construction. Only notable difference is length and slight variation in LED tone (pure white vs. warm white).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir garland; no indication of being pre-lit in name reduces relevancy. Same general use and style, slightly different material focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Beacon Hill Cypress Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial cypress garland—a related but different branch style. Pre-lit status not specified, so less directly comparable to the pre-lit reference item.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Red Sleigh Sequoia Fir Commercial Unlit Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit artificial garland of similar size and intended use, but misses the pre-lit feature, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time 2 ft. Prelit Yardville Pine Artificial Christmas Porch Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pre-lit product but it is a tree, not a garland, making it only tangentially relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Potted Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree in a pot, different silhouette and use from a garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 108'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar—faux pine garland, pre-lit, designed for holiday decor like the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time Yardville Pine 2-ft. Prelit Accent Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial holiday accent tree, not a garland. Only slight relevance due to artificial greenery and lighting.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FRONTGate Gilded Elegance Outdoor Christmas Decorations Swag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorative swag (not garland) for outdoor holiday use; different silhouette, but related decorative function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Glittery Pomegranate Pine Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 9ft pine garland with built-in clear lights, closely matching key functions of the reference item.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Centerville Pine Christmas Tree with Lighting
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree, not a garland; besides seasonal lighting, almost no feature overlap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6'x8" Pre-Lit Decorated Burgundy and Gold Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial pine garland, decorated for holidays; slightly different size, but core features highly aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7.5 ft. Norway Mixed Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Clear LED Lights Pine Cones & Berries
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree with lights and cones, not a garland; minimal relevance outside shared holiday theme.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Snow Mountain Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland, very similar in length and holiday use, though with 'snow mountain' styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6'x10" Pre-Lit Decorated Pine Artificial Christmas Garland with Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland, pre-lit with warm white LEDs, decorated. Matches reference features closely, with only minor size difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit White Pine Christmas Garland with 50 Warm White LED Lights and Timer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 9ft pre-lit white pine garland, warm white LEDs. Only difference is white pine vs. Carolina Pine and fewer lights, but otherwise highly similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' Leaves Berry and Pine Needle Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland decoration, likely unlit; similar silhouette and decorative use, but lacks pre-lit feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 14" Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Canadian pine garland, 9ft—core features align almost exactly with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Shadow Woods Flocked Spruce 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland Plug in
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 9ft pre-lit artificial spruce garland, similar function and construction; plug-in lighting differs slightly from battery-operated reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Alpine Collection Decorated Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and product type, likely artificial and decorated, but lighting and some construction features not detailed in the name.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Norfolk Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial garland, but appears unlit and potentially less detailed in decoration versus the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Winona Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir garland, similar in use, but lacks detail on pre-lit or decorative features, lowering relevancy.
